title: The Cure win their first-ever Grammys
caption: 🎉 Legendary band, The Cure, finally snag some Grammy gold! 🏆🎶 #AboutTime #TheCure #Grammys

title: Turnstile win first Grammys for Best Rock Album & Best Metal Performance
caption: 🏆 Rock on, Turnstile! Making history at the Grammys with double wins 🎸🤘 #Grammys #Turnstile #RockAndMetalRoyalty

title: Bad Bunny Makes History with Album of the Year Win
caption: 🐰🏆 Bad Bunny's on top of the world with an Album of the Year win! Let's celebrate this historic moment! 🎉 #BadBunny #AlbumOfTheYear

title: Megadeth Earn First #1 Album With Farewell LP
caption: Megadeth is bringing the 🔥🎸 Congrats on that #1 spot with their farewell album! 🎉🤘 #RockOnMegadeth

title: Timothée Chalamet Says He Demanded SNL Let Him Play Music: “This Is The New Way Of Doing Stuff”
caption: 🎤 Timothée Chalamet bringing the heat on SNL! Who knew he had those musical chops? 🔥🎶 #NewTalentOnTheRise
